entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
